content: this is a summary of a civil case heard in the panevėžys district court the case involves a division of matrimonial property between two parties referred to as the applicant and the defendant the defendant has been ordered to pay various fees including legal fees stamp duty and court fees the court has awarded the applicant a sectional a tv and a sofa bed while the defendant has been awarded a garage various furniture and electronics and a vehicle the defendant is also responsible for a personal obligation to the state tax inspectorate ministry of finance in lithuania the text discusses various articles from the civil code related to matrimonial property including the division of shares establishment of asset balance and determination of asset value the applicant is seeking a dissolution of marriage due to alcohol abuse and psychological tension the court has ordered the division of property with the defendant receiving certain movable property and the applicant receiving other movable property and a garage the defendant has been ordered to pay compensation to the applicant the court must also decide on the ownership of a vw golf car and an audi a6 avant the court has awarded the garage to the defendant and ordered compensation to the applicant the vw golf is considered the defendants personal property while the audi a6 avant is considered common property the court has made decisions on the division of other assets and addressed the division of obligations the court has partially satisfied the parties claims and ordered the payment of costs the court has determined that fault for the dissolution lies with both spouses the applicant is ordered to pay compensation to the defendant and the defendant is required to pay various fees and costs

metadata.cost: 75.00 EUR (legal fees) + 191.00 EUR (stamp duty) + 7.60 EUR (court fees) to be borne by the defendant + 138.60 EUR (legal fees) to be borne by the applicant
